```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, dpi=600, out.width="1450px", out.height="1080px"}
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(ggrepel)   
library(ggimage)    

oneTick <- c("Poland", "Netherlands", "Czech Republic", "Denmark", "Germany", "Romania",
             "Spain","Sweden", "Austria", "Norway")

world_map <- ne_countries(scale = 10, returnclass = "sf")

cities <- ne_download(scale = 10, type = "populated_places", category = "cultural",
                      returnclass = "sf", destdir = "../data")

consortium_cities <- dplyr::filter(
  cities,
  NAME_EN %in% c("Berlin", "Białystok", "Copenhagen", "Cluj-Napoca",
                 "Kristiansand", "Vienna", "Logroño",
                 "Jönköping", "Utrecht", "České Budějovice", "Stockholm")
)

consortium_map <- world_map |>
  mutate(consortium = if_else(name_en %in% oneTick, "consortium", "others"))


uni_labels <- tibble::tibble(
  NAME_EN = c("Berlin", "Białystok", "Copenhagen", "Cluj-Napoca",
              "Kristiansand", "Vienna", "Logroño",
              "Jönköping", "Utrecht", "České Budějovice", "Stockholm"),
  uni = c("TICK-RADAR GMBH,
          FREIE UNIVERSITAET BERLIN",
          "UNIWERSYTET MEDYCZNY W BIALYMSTOKU",
          "REGION HOVEDSTADEN",
          "UNIVERSITATEA DE STIINTE AGRICOLE SI 
          MEDICINA VETERINARA CLUJ NAPOCA",
          "SORLANDET SYKEHUS HF",
          "Pfizer Corporation Austria",
          "FUNDACION RIOJA SALUD-FRS",
          "JONKOPINGS LAN",
          "RIJKSINSTITUUT VOOR VOLKSGEZONDHEID 
          EN MILIEU",
          "BIOLOGICKE CENTRUM AKADEMIE VID CESKE 
          REPUBLIKY VEREJNA VYZKUMNA INSTITUCE",
          "SODERTORNS HOGSKOLA"))

consortium_cities <- consortium_cities |>
  left_join(uni_labels, by = "NAME_EN")

laea_europe <- "+proj=laea +lat_0=55 +lon_0=15 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs"

consortium_map_proj  <- st_transform(consortium_map, crs = st_crs(laea_europe))
consortium_cities_proj <- st_transform(consortium_cities, crs = st_crs(laea_europe))

bbox_laea <- st_as_sfc(st_bbox(c(xmin = -30, xmax = 40, ymin = 20, ymax = 90), crs = 4326)) |>
  st_transform(st_crs(laea_europe))


consortium_map_proj  <- st_intersection(consortium_map_proj, bbox_laea)
consortium_cities_proj <- consortium_cities_proj[st_within(consortium_cities_proj, bbox_laea, sparse = FALSE), ]

land_fill_other <- "#E6E8EF" 
land_fill_cons  <- "#7FB3D5" 
land_border     <- "#8A8FA3"
water_fill      <- "#F6FAFF"
city_fill       <- "white"
city_stroke     <- "#1F3556"
label_fill      <- "white"  
label_col       <- "#0F1A2B"

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = st_as_sf(bbox_laea), fill = water_fill, color = NA) +
  geom_sf(data = consortium_map_proj,
          aes(fill = consortium),
          color = land_border, linewidth = 0.2) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("consortium" = land_fill_cons,
                               "others"       = land_fill_other)) +
  geom_sf(data = consortium_cities_proj,
          shape = 21, size = 2.8, stroke = 0.6,
          fill = city_fill, color = city_stroke) +
  geom_text_repel(data = cbind(consortium_cities_proj,
                 st_coordinates(st_centroid(consortium_cities_proj))),
    aes(X, Y, label = uni),
    family = "sans", size = 1.5, min.segment.length = 0,
    segment.size = 0.25, segment.color = "#6B7280",
    box.padding = 0.5, point.padding = 0.3,
    bg.color = label_fill, bg.r = 0.12, color = label_col
  ) +
  coord_sf(crs = st_crs(laea_europe)) +
  guides(fill = "none") +
  theme_void(base_size = 11) +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = water_fill, color = NA),
    plot.title   = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, color = "#0B132B"),
    plot.subtitle= element_text(size = 10.5, color = "#334155"),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 8.5, color = "#6B7280", margin = margin(t = 6)),
    plot.margin  = margin(8, 12, 8, 12))
```
